price: Dan ia membuat perumpamaan bagi Kami dan dia lupa kepada kejadiannya; ia berkata, "Siapakah yang dapat menghidupkan tulang belulang yang telah hancur luluh?"
arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qāla man yuḥ'yī al-ʿiẓāma wahiya ramīmun
